event.title: Talk about the Fediverse at the Verkehrswende Camp in Berlin, Germany

body.p: Bits und BÃ¤ume Berlin have organized the Digital Village at the Verkehrswende Camp in Berlin. Tobias Diekershoff from the FSFE will have an introduction talk about the Fediverse there at 16:30h. The presentation is aimed at interested people with no prior knowledge of the Fediverse.

ul.li: Where: Verkehrswende Camp, Invalidenpark, Berlin Mitte

body.p: The presentation will be in German, but afterwards questions can be asked in English as well.
